languages.text: {n}Вы прикладываете руки к панели и мысленно посылаете в машину ряд команд, чтобы открыть сферу. В тот же момент ваши ладони прошивают десятки крошечных игл. По венам растекается жгучая жидкость. В голове отзывается шепот-мыслеобраз: доступ отозван.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы прикладываете руки к панели и мысленно посылаете в машину ряд команд, чтобы открыть сферу. В тот же момент ваши ладони прошивают десятки крошечных игл. По венам растекается жгучая жидкость. В голове отзывается шепот-мыслеобраз: доступ отозван.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You place your hands on the panel and transmit a series of mental commands into the machine, bidding it to open the sphere. Immediately, dozens of tiny needles shoot into your palms. An acrid liquid spreads through your veins. Then, a whispering thought forms in your head: access has been revoked.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы прикладываете руки к панели и мысленно посылаете в машину ряд команд, чтобы открыть сферу. В тот же момент ваши ладони прошивают десятки крошечных игл. По венам растекается жгучая жидкость. В голове отзывается шепот-мыслеобраз: доступ отозван.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You place your hands on the panel and send a series of mental commands into the machine, bidding it open the sphere. Instantly, dozens of tiny needles run into your palms. An acrid liquid spreads through your veins. The mental echo of a whisper forms in your head: "access revoked."{/n}

An acrid liquid spreads through your veins. Then, the mental echo of a whisper forms in your head: "Access revoked."{/n}

An acrid liquid spreads through your veins. Then, a whispering thought forms in your head: access has been revoked.{/n}

An acrid liquid spreads through your veins. Then, a whispering thought forms in your head: access has been revoked.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは両手をパネルに置き、球体を開けるよう、精神的な命令を機械に送った。すると直ちに、何十本もの細い針があなたの掌に突き刺さった。鼻をつくような刺激臭のする液体が血管の中へと広がっていく。やがて、ささやくような思念が頭の中に浮かんだ。「アクセスは取り消された」{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You place your hands on the panel and transmit a series of mental commands into the machine, bidding it to open the sphere. Immediately, dozens of tiny needles shoot into your palms. An acrid liquid spreads through your veins. Then, a whispering thought forms in your head: access has been revoked.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは両手をパネルに置き、球体を開けるよう、精神的な命令を機械に送った。すると直ちに、何十本もの細い針があなたの掌に突き刺さった。鼻をつくような刺激臭のする液体が血管の中へと広がっていく。やがて、ささやくような思念が頭の中に浮かんだ。「アクセスは取り消された」{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du legst deine Hände auf das Feld und überträgst eine Reihe von mentalen Befehlen in die Maschine. Du weist sie an, die Kugel zu öffnen. Sofort schießen dutzende von winzigen Nadeln in deine Handflächen. Eine beißende Flüssigkeit breitet sich in deinen Adern aus. Dann bildet sich in deinem Kopf ein wispernder Gedanke: Zugang entzogen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You place your hands on the panel and transmit a series of mental commands into the machine, bidding it to open the sphere. Immediately, dozens of tiny needles shoot into your palms. An acrid liquid spreads through your veins. Then, a whispering thought forms in your head: access has been revoked.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du legst deine Hände auf das Feld und überträgst eine Reihe von mentalen Befehlen in die Maschine. Du weist sie an, die Kugel zu öffnen. Sofort schießen dutzende von winzigen Nadeln in deine Handflächen. Eine beißende Flüssigkeit breitet sich in deinen Adern aus. Dann bildet sich in deinem Kopf ein wispernder Gedanke: Zugang entzogen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous posez les mains sur le panneau et transmettez mentalement une série d'ordres à la machine pour qu'elle ouvre la sphère. Immédiatement, des dizaines de minuscules aiguilles vous transpercent les paumes. Un liquide brûlant se répand dans vos veines, puis une pensée murmurante se forme dans votre esprit : votre accès vous a été retiré.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You place your hands on the panel and transmit a series of mental commands into the machine, bidding it to open the sphere. Immediately, dozens of tiny needles shoot into your palms. An acrid liquid spreads through your veins. Then, a whispering thought forms in your head: access has been revoked.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous posez les mains sur le panneau et transmettez mentalement une série d'ordres à la machine pour qu'elle ouvre la sphère. Immédiatement, des dizaines de minuscules aiguilles vous transpercent les paumes. Un liquide brûlant se répand dans vos veines, puis une pensée murmurante se forme dans votre esprit : votre accès vous a été retiré.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Colocas las manos sobre el panel y transmites una serie de órdenes mentales a la máquina, conminándola a que abra la esfera. Inmediatamente se te clavan docenas de agujas diminutas en las palmas de las manos. Un fluido acre se propaga por tus venas. Acto seguido se forma un pensamiento en tu mente: te han denegado el acceso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You place your hands on the panel and transmit a series of mental commands into the machine, bidding it to open the sphere. Immediately, dozens of tiny needles shoot into your palms. An acrid liquid spreads through your veins. Then, a whispering thought forms in your head: access has been revoked.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Colocas las manos sobre el panel y transmites una serie de órdenes mentales a la máquina, conminándola a que abra la esfera. Inmediatamente se te clavan docenas de agujas diminutas en las palmas de las manos. Un fluido acre se propaga por tus venas. Acto seguido se forma un pensamiento en tu mente: te han denegado el acceso.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你将手掌贴在控制面板上，通过意识传达了一系列命令，让机器打开球形监狱。随后，几十根细小的尖针刺入了你的手掌，某种热辣的液体在你的血管里扩散。在这之后，低语声在你的脑海中响了起来——访问已被撤销。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You place your hands on the panel and transmit a series of mental commands into the machine, bidding it to open the sphere. Immediately, dozens of tiny needles shoot into your palms. An acrid liquid spreads through your veins. Then, a whispering thought forms in your head: access has been revoked.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你将手掌贴在控制面板上，通过意识传达了一系列命令，让机器打开球形监狱。随后，几十根细小的尖针刺入了你的手掌，某种热辣的液体在你的血管里扩散。在这之后，低语声在你的脑海中响了起来——访问已被撤销。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elini panele koyuyorsun ve zihninden makineye bir dizi emir göndererek küreyi açmasını talep ediyorsun. Aniden onlarca ufak iğne, avucuna batıyor; kekremsi bir sıvı, damarlarına hücum ediyor. Ardından zihninde bir düşüncenin fısıltısı yankılanıyor: Erişim yetkisi kaldırıldı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You place your hands on the panel and transmit a series of mental commands into the machine, bidding it to open the sphere. Immediately, dozens of tiny needles shoot into your palms. An acrid liquid spreads through your veins. Then, a whispering thought forms in your head: access has been revoked.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elini panele koyuyorsun ve zihninden makineye bir dizi emir göndererek küreyi açmasını talep ediyorsun. Aniden düzinelerce ufak iğne avucuna batıyor, kekremsi bir sıvı damarlarına hücum ediyor. Ardından zihninde bir düşüncenin fısıltısı yankılanıyor: Erişim yetkisi kaldırıldı.{/n}
